thread.title: Cabinet approves Māori Language Bill amendments (New Zealand Government)

author: wn.com
title: Cabinet approves Māori Language Bill amendments (New Zealand Government)
text: ( Source : New Zealand Government ) Māori Development Minister Te Ururoa Flavell says ' Cabinet has approved amendments be made to the Māori Language ( Te Reo Māori ) Bill .' 'I am pleased that Cabinet has agreed to the landmark decision to enact
